Broadlist Years Lists

Broadlist dev deploy test

Broadlist is a collection of books which have been included in longlists, shortlists, and literary prizes from all over the world. Its purpose is to catelogue those lists and help readers find books to read. Read more about its purpose.

To date, Broadlist has collected 41 book lists, spanning 15 years, including 591 books from 550 authors.
